image_url.description: The URL of the reference image.

output_format.description: The format of the generated image.

subject_detection.description: Specifies which subjects to detect and process. Options: 'All' (detect all subjects), 'Foreground' (detect only foreground subjects), 'Background' (detect background subjects).

face_enhancement.description: Whether to enhance faces in the image. When true, the model applies face-specific improvements.

face_enhancement_creativity.description: Level of creativity for face enhancement (0-1). Higher values allow more creative, less conservative changes.

face_enhancement_strength.description: How sharp enhanced faces are relative to background (0-1). Lower values blend changes subtly; higher values make faces more pronounced.

strength.description: Defines the overall intensity of the sharpening effect. Increases details. Too much sharpening can create an unrealistic result.

focus_boost.description: Corrects images that are missing detail by downscaling your image then upscaling the results back to the original size. Use on very blurry images!

seed.description: Optional fixed seed for repeatable results.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

b64_json.description: The base64-encoded JSON of the generated image.

tokens_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v1/images/generations' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "model": "topaz-labs/sharpen-gen",
    "prompt": "A T-Rex relaxing on a beach, lying on a sun lounger and wearing sunglasses."
  }'

POST /v1/images/generations HTTP/1.1
Host: api.aimlapi.com
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: */*

{
  "model": "topaz-labs/sharpen-gen",
  "prompt": "A T-Rex relaxing on a beach, lying on a sun lounger and wearing sunglasses."
}
